conversion_verification.notes: The conversion cleanly transforms the 2D plan into an isometric 3D cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation with clear wall thickness, floor separation, and stable isometric perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Very high fidelity. All rooms (Utility, Kitchen, Living, 2 Bedrooms, Toilets, Decks) are present and correctly positioned. Minor simplification on the exact depth of the entry foyer.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate to the floor plan's suggestion, including the dining table, sofas, and bed orientations.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with consistent lighting. No UI contamination or text artifacts present.

detected_errors.description: The threshold between the foyer and living room is slightly more open than indicated in the architectural plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains nearly perfect geometric alignment with the original architectural floor plan.
